巴黎歌剧院, 加尼叶歌剧院, 尼尔宫

sentences.sentence: At the Palais Royal I suggested that we stop and have a drink.
sentences.translation: 到了王宫那儿，我提议停下喝一杯。

sentences.sentence: You know that when he left here he was taken to the Palais DE Justice.
sentences.translation: 您知道，他离开这儿以后，就被关到法院的监狱里去了。

sentences.sentence: I have been myself to the best engraver of the Palais Royal, who did the plate in my presence.
sentences.translation: 我亲自到王宫市场去找的那儿最好的刻工，亲自看着他刻版。
